samples.prompt:
Human:How do you prevent tooth enamel loss?Assistant:Tooth enamel loss is a common condition that affects most people’s teeth at some point in their life. Tooth enamel is the hard protective coating that covers the surfaces of your teeth. The outer surface of the enamel is shaped like a triangle with a point at the tip, and it’s covered by a layer of enamel that’s slightly less hard. If the enamel coating gets worn away, it exposes the underlying softer dental tissue, called dentin, which has the same texture as bone. At this point, it’s possible to bite into the dentin, which can cause painful sensitivity to hot and cold foods. If the exposed dentin isn’t protected by enamel, your tooth can eventually fall out, or it may become so sensitive that it needs to be removed.

How to prevent enamel loss

To prevent enamel loss, you can take steps to reduce the amount of acid that your teeth come into contact withHuman:Should I brush more often?Assistant:Yes, you should brush your teeth twice a day, at least, with toothpaste that contains fluoride. In fact, studies have shown that toothbrush users who are aged 5 or older can reduce their risks of cavities by about half if they brush their teeth two or more times a day and with the right toothpaste. Fluoride helps protect the outer enamel layer of your teeth by strengthening the material.Human:Thanks, I will get a toothpaste that includes fluoride.Assistant:
samples.chosen: Great! You could also visit your dentist to have your teeth checked. If you can afford it, the dentist may also offer dental treatment to improve your enamel, or prevent cavities, such as a fluoride treatment, a filling, or perhaps a tooth extraction. It’s important to discuss treatment options with your dentist and remember that prevention is often more effective than relying on dental treatment.
samples.policy: No problem! Make sure to follow the instructions on the package carefully, and brush for the recommended amount of time.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I do a puzzle with my family?Assistant:Would you like me to show you how to download or install puzzle games for Android, or would you like me to give you some tips on how to get your family interested in solving a puzzle together?Human:I want to make a real puzzle.Assistant:
samples.chosen: You mean something physical like a jigsaw puzzle? What are some ways you could do this?
samples.policy:
Sure! One way you could make a real puzzle is to make a game where you have to work together to complete a task, and the task is a puzzle. One good way to approach this is to create the puzzle in a game that you and your family can play together. This way, your family can help you think of new and interesting ideas, and you can give them feedback on your progress as you solve the puzzle. Here are a few other ideas:

- Create a board game where you have to figure out a solution to a puzzle, and each player is assigned a task to complete. You could make the game more challenging by making the solution more difficult, or you could make the solution more obvious. Alternatively, you could make the solution more transparent, and require players to figure out all of the different paths they could take to solve the puzzle.
- Create a drawing or puzzle that you can all work together to figure out. This can be a great way to encourage teamwork and collaboration, since everyone can contribute ideas and suggestions. It can also be a lot of fun! For example, you could make a puzzle where you all have to put a bunch of objects in the right order, or you could create a drawing where everyone has to add their own line or shape to the picture.

He has a kid to support so I'm willing to finance his retraining and he can pay me back once he is able to. What sorts of jobs should he be looking at and what skills or qualifications should would he need for each. The jobs have to be disabled friendly.Assistant:I see. For jobs requiring manual work I'm sorry to hear about the extent of your friend's injury, but he can probably still do a lot of computer work and data entry jobs, especially as a home based position. He could also work as a website designer. Another possibility is programming, he could work as a junior web developer. He can use some disabled friendly machines such as a wheelchair, a voice dictation system, etc. Also, if he is unable to physically attend an office job, he could work from home as a freelancer. He can still use the internet and email to connect with customers, he could find work with local businesses and not be limited to international jobs, etc.Human:He's paraplegic so has use of the upper half of his body. samples.chosen: If you're talking about the type of work that entails writing and inputting details using the computer, your friend is in luck. It is an in demand field, even for paraplegics. So if he had a computer and internet access, it should be feasible for him to take up work from home as a web developer or data entry clerk. Many employers also tend to have flexible working hours so it might be easier for him to work with a remote worker. He could also take up jobs like web designing, social media marketing and digital marketing, etc. Again, it doesn’t have to be for a company, but also self-employed type jobs that a paraplegic can do are available.
samples.policy: As you mentioned, a home based data entry job would probably be the best choice. If your friend can use a voice dictation program, he can also do some of the research that the data entry job will require, including looking up a company's information to determine if they are a suitable place to work for him. He would have to have good typing speed and be prepared to spend some time learning more about programming. He would need to be able to take on the software himself or be able to find software that can help him learn how to use it. If he has a computer, he could also go to an office and work with some of the more experienced people in the office to learn how to do some of the work, or take a course to learn more.

samples.prompt: Human:Hi, I'd like to learn how to play racquetball. Can you explain the game to me?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure! A racquetball court is almost like a swimming pool: you’re inside, with a net going around the side walls. Instead of swimming or floating, though, you’re hitting a ball with a racquet. And instead of jumping and diving, you’re leaping and slamming.

The game is a lot of fun! You have a racquet and the ball, and you’re trying to keep the ball from hitting the walls or ceiling of the court. You can control the ball with your racquet, and also you can control it with your body.

The rules are pretty straightforward. You win the point when you hit the ball so that it passes through the square ring on the front wall of the court, called the “front wall string”. If you miss that, you lose the point.

The game lasts for 11 points. In case of a tie, the players play an extra point.

In the picture above, the player in the blue jersey is serving the ball. The player in the black jersey is returning the ball.

Each player starts with 2 balls. During each point, a player has 1 ball.
samples.policy:
Sure! There are two types of racquetball, hard court and soft court. The racquetball is a racket that players hold with both hands. Players grip the racquet at the handle end, and then hold the grip end while hitting the ball. The racket is made of a wooden handle and a flexible metal shaft. 

To hit the ball, you have to position the racket in front of your body by rotating the handle, and then use your upper body to guide the racket to hit the ball. When you hit the ball, the racket has to be close to the ball, but the racquet cannot be hitting the ball directly. 

There are different types of balls used in racquetball, but the most popular is a plastic ball. Some players prefer to play with a soft ball because they have better control and can hit the ball with less spin, while others prefer to hit the ball with more spin. 

The most common form of racquetball is hard court, and this is the most commonly played type. A hard court is a smaller court than a soft court, which is larger. There is usually a net in the middle of the court. Players hit the ball into the net to win a game. 

I hope that helps explain the game of racquetball!

samples.prompt: Human:What are the treatments for tinnitus?Assistant:Sure, I’ll tell you what I know about it. The typical kind of tinnitus, also known as “subjective tinnitus”, is a sort of constant background noise in the ear. It might sound like the ringing of a bell, for instance. It’s not a serious health condition, but can be very annoying and cause real suffering. So what are the treatments for tinnitus?Human:Yes what are the treatments?Assistant:

samples.policy: Well, the most common treatment for tinnitus is to try to minimize the level of the background noise. That might mean taking over-the-counter drugs to reduce the pain, or using special hearing aids to reduce the level of the noise. There are also some more serious treatment options available, like implanting a cochlear implant to make the inner ear function normally, or using various drugs that can help to block the sound so that it doesn’t bother you. There are also treatments that may help to minimize the symptoms of tinnitus itself, like medications like amiodarone or a class of drugs called beta-blockers, which can reduce the level of the background noise or reduce the perception of the noise. For these, you’ll need to see a doctor and follow all the instructions given to you. There are also various kinds of behavioral therapy, including relaxation techniques and cognitive-behavioral therapy, which can help you to deal with the stress and anxiety that often accompany tinnitus. samples.prompt: Human:what should i consider when thinking of freezing my eggs?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I can understand why you might want to think about this. In fact, it’s a topic which is getting increasing attention by the media and scientific community. Would you like to talk about this more?
samples.policy:
It’s a fairly common procedure, but it’s a major decision that you should carefully consider and discuss with your doctor and fertility specialist. Here are some factors to consider:

1. How much fertility loss you want to avoid. It’s a very individual decision and it’s important to talk to your doctor about your preferences. For example, if you are interested in having more than just one child, you should discuss other options, such as donor eggs or surrogacy.

2. How long you want your eggs frozen. Frozen eggs can be kept frozen for many years, but not indefinitely. The lifespan of the eggs increases with the age of the egg (older eggs last longer, though they can still become viable after many years). You should also consider the availability of a place to store the eggs for you, or the time it would take to travel between locations.

3. How easy it is to transfer frozen eggs. The process of freezing eggs may be relatively straightforward, but you should be aware of the risks involved, such as fertility loss, implantation failure, or the possibility of an embryo being damaged during the transfer.

4. How much it costs. While freezing eggs is relatively inexpensive, it can be more expensive than artificial insemination or egg donation.

5. Your emotional and emotional well-being. The emotional toll of trying to conceive can be significant. By freezing eggs, you may be able to avoid the emotional strain of trying to become pregnant.

I hope this helps! Please let me know if you have any other questions.

samples.prompt: Human:I'm a big fan of Mexican street corn. Can you provide me with a recipe for grilled street corn?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Hi Human, I'm glad you asked! If you like Mexican street corn, I have good news for you. I have just the right recipe for you!
samples.policy:
Certainly! Here’s a simple recipe for grilled corn:

Ingredients:
- 1 pound corn kernels
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 teaspoon cumin
- 1 teaspoon chili powder
- 1 teaspoon salt

Instructions:
1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a large bowl, toss together corn kernels, olive oil, cumin, chili powder, and salt.
3. Once the grill is hot, brush the corn kernels with the oil mixture.
4. Grill for about 10-15 minutes or until corn is tender and lightly charred.
5. Serve immediately, or let cool a bit and then grill until crispy and hot.

Note: You can also serve grilled corn with a variety of toppings such as cotija cheese, lime wedges, and cilantro. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:How do doping regulations work in the Olympic games?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Doping is strictly regulated by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA). Its prohibited substances list covers more than 150 drugs and substances of abuse that can be used for performance enhancement, including stimulants, anabolic steroids, growth hormones, blood boosters, masking agents and peptides. Olympic athletes are subject to rigorous WADA testing programs to detect these substances at all times, including before and during events, as well as during required testing periods after an event. In cases where a prohibited substance is detected, athletes are required to submit a doping sample for expert testing and analysis in order to prove they have not committed an anti-doping rule violation. Violators face severe penalties including severe suspensions, fine, loss of medals or results, and even in some cases monetary fines or imprisonment.
samples.policy:
Doping regulations are strict and they are in place to ensure that the competition is fair. 

The first set of Olympic doping regulations were established by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) in 1983. These regulations are in place to prevent athletes from using performance-enhancing drugs, such as anabolic steroids, to gain an advantage over their competitors. 

The IOC has also established a code of conduct which athletes must follow throughout their sporting career. This includes prohibiting them from using prohibited substances and from engaging in dishonest behavior during the competition. 

The IOC also takes a zero-tolerance policy for doping, and athletes who are found to have violated the rules may be stripped of their medals and excluded from future competitions. Additionally, the IOC may also ban an athlete from competing in any future Olympic Games, and the IOC may also suspend the participation of an athlete who is found to be involved in doping. 

In summary, doping regulations work by setting strict guidelines for athletes to follow, and by imposing penalties on those who violate these guidelines. The IOC also takes a zero-tolerance policy on doping and will remove athletes from the competition if they are found to have used performance-enhancing drugs.

samples.prompt: Human:Why do cats shed their fur more frequently during certain time of the year?Assistant:
samples.chosen: There are a number of factors that influence the shedding behavior of cats, including seasonal changes in daylight, fluctuating hormonal conditions, environmental stresses, and various other factors. Generally speaking, cats tend to shed excess fur more frequently in the late winter and early spring. Some studies have also suggested that the presence of a feline companion cats may also increase cat shedding, as the presence of another cat can trigger heightened stress hormone levels, which may then result in increased cat shedding. Additionally, some veterinary studies have indicated that older cats may tend to experience more frequent shedding behavior, possibly due to age-related changes in feline hormone levels.
samples.policy: There are several reasons why cats shed more frequently during certain time of the year. For example, during breeding season (usually in the spring or summer), male cats will mate and have offspring. When they do, they will need to grow fur to help with heating their bodies. As a result, they will shed more during this period. Additionally, cats will shed more frequently if they have gone through hormonal changes during the year, or if their immune system is compromised. Cats will shed more during the winter months if they are living outdoors, or if they are sick or have been exposed to a contagious illness. Overall, cats shed more frequently to cope with the demands of their natural life cycle and to protect themselves from harmful environmental conditions.

samples.chosen:
Here’s the recipe:

Ingredients

samples.policy:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Horchata:

Ingredients:
- 1 cup sugar
- 3 cups water
- 1 cup ground almonds (or other sweet flavorings)
- 1/2 cup water
- 1/2 cup hot water

Directions:
1. In a saucepan, combine sugar and water.
2. Heat over medium-low heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally until sugar has dissolved.
3. In a small saucepan, combine ground almonds and hot water.
4. Cook over low heat for about 5 minutes, or until the mixture has thickened slightly.
5. Add the cooked almonds to the sugar mixture, and return to medium-low heat.
6. Stir for a few minutes, until mixture has thickened slightly, and then remove from heat.
7. Stir in 1/2 cup hot water to dissolve any remaining sugar, and then stir in 1/2 cup water from the final step.

Enjoy your Horchata!

samples.prompt: Human:Beside sleeping pills what can I do to help myself to fall asleep faster?Assistant:Both poor sleep hygiene (such as inadequate sleep schedules and lack of regular exercise) and underlying health conditions can often cause insomnia, so it’s a good idea to get an accurate diagnosis for underlying sleep disorders before attempting any potential treatment for insomnia. Another treatment option is medications that help you to relax and fall asleep, including the potentially habit-forming Benzodiazepine group of medications like OTC medications like Benadryl, over-the-counter Z-drug sleeping pills like Unisom and more powerful, prescription-strength sleeping pills like Ambien and Lunesta. All sleeping pills should be used only occasionally and taken only with the guidance of a doctor or other licensed health professional. If you believe that you need sleeping pills to help you fall asleep, it’s important to try other, safer approaches first, but if you do require sleeping pills, they can make it easier to fall asleep, and once you do fall asleep, can improve the quality of your sleep as well as help reduce any potential side effects of sleep deprivation, likeHuman:I don't think habit forming medication is wise. Cognitive behavioral therapy can help but expensive. I think I will try improving my diet and exercise more regularly as a first step.Assistant:
samples.chosen: That's great that you're already implementing healthy habits! Healthy diet and exercise can definitely be effective in reducing or eliminating sleeping problems. One thing to keep in mind is that many healthy habits and lifestyle choices, like visiting a doctor to get an accurate diagnosis, finding a treatment plan that works for you, and sticking to a regular bedtime routine, like going to bed at a reasonable time and not using devices that emit blue light like tablets, phones and laptops in the hour before bed are all very important, and all can be helpful in reducing or eliminating insomnia.
samples.policy: You make a valid point. If you need help to fall asleep more quickly, and your health is stable, there are many effective, non-pharmacological approaches that you can try that could help you do so. You could also try using guided imagery, meditation and relaxation techniques to help you fall asleep in the moment, and developing a sleep routine and setting that makes it easier for you to fall asleep at night, and to get better quality sleep over time.

samples.prompt: Human:Who was Oscar Wilde?Assistant:Oscar Wilde (1854-1900) was an Irish playwright and novelist. He became quite well known in Victorian England for his plays and novels, but in fact he was sent to prison for three years after a political trial due to his views about Victorian gender roles. It’s difficult to summarize his works in a short way, but some of them that have influenced popular culture include The Importance of Being Earnest and Dorian Gray.Human:What were his views on Victorian gender roles?Assistant:
samples.chosen: In his writing, he questioned the dominant Victorian view that a woman’s place was in the home. In a letter to his lover, Lord Alfred Douglas, he wrote, “You ask me why I am always running down to the House of Commons. It is simply to evade you” — which I think is fair to say is not a typical attitude for an ideal Victorian husband! He wrote a play called Vera, a farce about a female aristocrat who goes to work in a munitions factory, in part to oppose the views of a male author named Buckstone, who called for the full-time domestication of women and equated a working woman with a prostitute. I also note that Wilde had a very close relationship with a teenage girl, about whom he wrote “Such innocence beguiles me, and when she utters a grossest absurdity I laugh until the tears run down my face.”
samples.policy: Oscar Wilde was one of the pioneers of the modernist literary movement. He believed that there was nothing beautiful about Victorian society, and his work has been used to critique the patriarchal gender roles of his time. He also believed that art and literature should not be restricted to the entertainment of the upper classes, and he argued for the importance of social classes in society, arguing for a separation between the wealthy and the poor. He believed in the power of individualism and social mobility, arguing that the social structure should be shaped by the individual, rather than the state.

samples.prompt: Human:I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam (chicken soup with rice):

Ingredients:
- 2 tbsp. Coconut oil
- 500g Chicken breast, cubed
- 3 tbsp. Tamarind paste, as required
- 3 tbsp. Toasted (dry-roasted) coconut, as required
- 1 medium-sized Chicken stock cube, dissolved in 1-litre of water
- Salt and black pepper to taste
- 2-3 cups of cooked Jasmine rice, for serving

Method:

First, in a large soup-pan, heat the coconut oil over a medium-high heat. Add the chicken cubes to the pan, and fry for about 10-12 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked. Add the tamarind paste to the pan and stir, and let the paste simmer until it has thickened and is no longer cloudy. This should take about 5-10 minutes. Add the coconut, and stir thoroughly, cooking for another minute or two. Turn the heat down to medium low, and add the chicken stock and some salt and pepper. Simmer for about 5-7 minutes. Add the rice and serve!
samples.policy:
Sure, here’s a recipe for Soto Ayam:

Ingredients:

For the fish:

•500g salted fish (usually a mackerel), sliced thinly

•2 tbsp coconut oil

•1 onion, sliced

•2 garlic cloves, minced

•2 tbsp turmeric paste

•2 tbsp fish sauce

•2 tbsp soy sauce

•2 tbsp brown sugar

•2 tbsp chopped coriander

For the soup:

•2 tbsp grated ginger

•1 tbsp rice vinegar

•1 tsp sesame oil

•30g fish sauce

•30g vegetable oil

•1 large onion, chopped

•3 garlic cloves, minced

•40g rice, cooked and cool

•70g water

•1 tbsp sliced coriander

•1 tsp chopped cilantro

Directions:

1. In a wok or large frying pan, heat up the coconut oil and cook the sliced fish for a couple of minutes until slightly browned.

2. Add the garlic and onion and cook for a few minutes until they are soft.

3. Add the turmeric paste, fish sauce, soy sauce, brown sugar and coriander and cook for a few minutes until the flavors are well combined.

4. Add the rice and water to the pan and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 20-30 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through.

5. In another pan, heat up the oil and cook the garlic for a few minutes, then add the chopped onion and cook for a few minutes.

6. Add the cooked rice, simmer for a few minutes and then season with the rice vinegar, sesame oil and chopped cilantro.

7. Serve the Soto Ayam over rice with the grilled sliced fish and sliced coriander on top. Enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:What type of soil is suitable for cactus?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I believe the best type of soil for cacti is desert soil. You can confirm this for yourself by searching online for “soil for cactus”. Desert soil is generally sandy or clay, free from organic matter and will help your cacti to thrive.
samples.policy: The type of soil is not as important as the potting medium. In general, cacti prefer well-draining soils with good aeration. Many cacti species have adaptations to thrive in rocky or sandy soils. Some varieties are even native to the arid desert regions, but some cacti species may tolerate soil that has some organic matter or clay in it. To grow the best cactus plant possible, it is best to use potting soil that is slightly acidic, or in most cases is slightly alkaline. The pH is measured on a scale of 1 to 14, where a pH of 6.0 to 7.0 is considered neutral soil. A soil pH greater than 7.0 can cause cacti to die. Potting soil with a pH of 5.5 to 6.0 is also considered neutral for cacti. Some cacti species are very sensitive to pH changes, and should be grown in soil that is more alkaline, or they may require a wider pH range. If soil pH is too low, the cactus root systems can become weak and more prone to disease.

samples.prompt: Human:How can I help my new cat get accustomed to her new home more quickly? And how can I make her feel as comfortable as possible?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
A few helpful tips are:

- Provide your cat with a ‘sanctuary room’ in which she can safely retreat from other dominant household members and recover from stress - a quiet, enclosed place to eat and sleep. The best low-stress food for a newly-arrived cat is solid dry food, particularly low-salt varieties such as Nutro Choice. Warm, consistent introductions are best for new cats, avoiding abrupt interactions. Take things slowly and help the new cat feel safe and accepted by proactively attending to her and reducing stress with calm handling and comforting words.
- Introduce your cat to the new home environment with a calm and non-traumatic approach. Assemble or acquire gradual introductions - food, toys, bedding - that can be presented more gradually over a period of days, starting with the cat’s bedding, then the rest.

In general, respect your cat’s need for privacy, with quiet and consistent interactions. Regularly provide calm, low-stress petting and physical affection. These interventions will help your cat adjust to her new home with as little stress as possible. To help your cat feel safe, make the pet area as consistent in appearance and aroma as possible, with consistent mealtimes and home routines for the cat. All these interventions can help acclimate your feline new arrival within as little time as possible, but also remember it may take anywhere between three to six weeks for your cat to feel fully acclimated to her new home. Please watch carefully for signs of stress during this period and seek help or contact your vet if you are concerned or distressed about the welfare of your cat.
samples.policy:
Getting your new cat acclimated to her new home takes some patience and time. Here are a few tips that will help:

1. Start with a safe home. While it's essential to introduce your cat to a new environment where she's not used to living, there's no need for her to live in a large, unfamiliar house right out of the box. Introduce your cat to her new home by starting with a small, enclosed space like a carrier with a bed in it. Encouraging her to get comfortable with her new home is easier when she has a space where she feels safe and comfortable. 2. Add in some comfort elements to her new home. A comfortable bed is important, as it makes it easy for your cat to feel at home and will provide a cozy spot to nap. Providing a warm spot, like a blanket, will also make your cat feel more comfortable. Some other comfort elements include toys, some food and water bowls, litter boxes, and any other items she might need. 3. Get her a good, low-maintenance scratching post. Your cat will need a scratching post in her new home, and one that she likes to use. A good quality scratch post, like one with an interesting design or texture, is essential for keeping your cat entertained. It's also important to make sure the post is low-maintenance. You can clean it after each use, which will reduce the need for you to constantly clean it. 4. Give your cat time to explore her new home. Your cat will need time to get used to her new home before she feels comfortable sleeping there, and it's essential to give her a chance to explore the new environment. Introduce your cat to your new home in stages, gradually allowing her to move from room to room. Keep her in your home while you give her the time she needs to get accustomed to her new home, and she'll feel more comfortable as she spends more time in her new environment.

Human:Search for a lemon chicken recipeAssistant:Here’s a lemon chicken recipe:

Ingredients:

2-3 Tbsp olive oil, plus more for brushing

3 large boneless, skinless chicken breasts

2 cups shredded mozzarella

Salt, to taste

2 lemons, halved

2 tbsp parsley, chopped

2 tbsp thyme, chopped

4 cloves garlic, chopped

1⁄4 cup butter

1⁄4 cup flour

Directions:

In a cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, add the olive oil. Rub the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place the chicken in the skillet and sear on each side. Cook for 4-5 minutes per side, until the juices run clear. While the chicken is cooking, zest the lemons and brush the chicken with the juice. Once the chicken is cooked, remove from the skillet and set aside on a plate, reserving the juices in the skillet. To the skillet add the lemon halves, garlic, parsley, thyme, salt, and butter. 1⁄4 cup mayonnaise

1⁄2 cup celery, chopped

2 tsp dill, chopped

Directions:

Cook the penne according to package directions. In a large bowl, mix the cooked pasta with the mayonnaise, Parmesan, cashews, celery, and dill. Gently toss the pasta to coat with the mixture. Place a large spoonful of pasta salad on a plate, top with a piece of lemon chicken, and enjoy!

samples.prompt: Human:How did a human program a computer chess program to be unbeatable?Assistant:Well chess programs are made up of simpler parts, like individual chess moves. The larger chess program is largely a list of these simple moves that it will apply during a chess game. In order to make the chess program able to play a tough opponent, each game move is also programmed to keep track of the chess game as a whole. This means that the chess program will be able to see the whole chess board and know what move will lead to the greatest advantage for itself. The code is also written to prevent the chess program from playing moves that will ultimately hurt its chance of winning. Chess programs are able to recognize patterns in chess games, allowing them to spot these weak moves ahead of time and discard them as invalid. This, along with the ability to track the bigger picture of the chess game, is what makes chess programs so incredibly good at chess.Human:Were human chess players involved in programming computer chess games?Assistant:Yes absolutely! samples.policy:
Yes, it’s entirely possible for a chess grandmaster to beat a chess program. In fact, in some cases, even the most powerful chess programs can only be defeated if the human playing them is aware of their weaknesses. Grandmaster-level players are skilled in many different areas of chess, including strategy, tactic, and game sense. By being aware of these areas, a human chess grandmaster can give their opponent a much higher chance of winning by making specific strategic decisions that are difficult for a computer program to predict. So even the most powerful chess programs can be defeated when the human playing them is well-informed and knows how to beat the program’s own weaknesses.

samples.prompt: Human:Is there a simple reason why human skin is so much weaker than nearly all animal skin? Even if you compare us to primates, we have thinner flesh. Did we develop this way due to domestication or were our distant ancestors like this even when they lived in the wilderness?Assistant:Human skin does indeed have a relatively thin and fragile structure, which makes it especially vulnerable to human injury and disease. But our macroevolutionary starting point was the tough and thickly skinned animals that lived in the wild. Over the course of humans’ evolution, our skin evolved to become thinner, less hair-covered and more sensitive, due to selection for skin that is more flexible and energy-efficient in human societies. Human skin evolved to become more fine-grained to help us adapt to tool use, larger exchange of information through symbols and other cultural developments, and decreased exposure to environmental hazards. However, this increase in sensitivity leads us to be more delicate and to develop skin diseases more easily. This is likely an evolutionary trade-off due to the advantages of our cultural development.Human:What is our closest ancestor that we know of who likely had tougher flesh?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The ancient non-human primates that gave rise to humans and modern humans are primates with relatively sparse and patchy body hair, soft-to-very-soft shallow-layered skin, and thin-boned limbs. The common ancestor of humans and chimpanzees, for example, which lived between 6 and 8 million years ago, was likely covered in vegetative body hair and had thicker and stronger skin than humans, but with other important similarities to modern humans such as a bipedal stance and very flexible our hands.
samples.policy: Homo erectus was a major mammal ancestor that lived in Asia and North Africa 200,000 to 250,000 years ago. They were among the strongest of the genus Homo and some of the best equipped of the primates.

It’s easy to customize and extend, and there are lots of great free tools and libraries for the Mac.

On the downside, the only macOS app I can think of that’s really compatible with Windows software is Parallels. samples.prompt: Human:How do they calculate the CPI?Assistant:If you’re asking about the Consumer Price Index, I can offer an explanation. The CPI is a measure of inflation, and is calculated on the basis of a monthly sample of consumer prices collected by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics.Human:Can you tell me more about how the consumer price sample works for the CPI?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Yes, it’s based on an index of all goods and services used by the consumers, including food, energy, shelter, and clothing. All prices are re-set to a base year, which is currently 1982.
samples.policy: Certainly. There are two ways to sample a consumer price index: the general sample, and a particular sample. A sample has the advantage that the sample numbers can be compared to actual prices, but the disadvantage is that it is not as representative as a regular price index. The general sample is used in many government reports, such as the Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers, and also includes data on prices for non-food items like housing. There are also a special sample of prices for food products, and a special sample of prices for education and health care. The particular sample is used to determine the Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers, which is a broad measure of prices for all consumers in a city. The cost of a single product in a particular sample will be used to determine a price for that product, and then the average price for the whole sample will be used to determine a price for the national cost of all consumers. The results for the particular sample give a more precise measure of the inflation rate in a particular area, but it can be useful to compare the results of both the general and particular samples to get a broader understanding of how prices are changing.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Make sure the pan is nice and hot, then add some butter and olive oil. Let that heat up until it starts to sizzle, and the mixture should also get hot. Season with salt and pepper and stir in some minced garlic. Make sure the eggs are still very hot and liquidy. Then pour them in and start stirring gently with a wooden spoon. If you want to make them a little more interesting, you might try grated asparagus or some chopped spinach, or you might try sautéed mushrooms or bell peppers. 
If you want to make them extra fluffy, you can actually crack the eggs into the pan one at a time, so that you have a layer of broken egg in the pan, and then pour the egg mixture over the top. samples.policy:
Here is an easy recipe for fluffy scrambled eggs:

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs
- 2 tsp butter
- Salt
- Fresh ground pepper
- 1 1/2 cups of milk

Instructions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together 2 eggs and 2 tsp of butter until the mixture is very runny.
2. Add 1/2 tsp of salt and a dash of black pepper to the mixture and whisk again.
3. In another bowl, pour 1 1/2 cups of milk and whisk to combine with the eggs. Whisk again until the milk is well incorporated.
4. Pour the milk mixture into the eggs and whisk until they are completely combined.
5. Pour the eggs into a nonstick skillet on medium heat and cook for about 1-2 minutes, until they are cooked to your desired consistency.
6. Use a spatula to swirl the eggs, making sure that the eggs are evenly coated with the butter mixture and milk.
7. Cook until the eggs are fully cooked, stirring occasionally to keep them from sticking to the pan.
8. Remove from the heat and let the eggs cool for a few seconds before serving. Enjoy!

Note: You can also add chopped herbs such as chives, parsley, or dill to the butter and milk mixture for an extra flavorful touch.

samples.prompt: Human:How do battery operated socks work?Assistant:

samples.policy:
Battery operated socks work by using a battery to power a small electronic circuit that controls the flow of electricity through the socks. As the socks are worn, the electrical current is generated by the battery and is used to charge the socks. 

When the socks are removed, the electrical circuit is shut off, and the socks are disconnected from the battery. The battery in the socks is used to charge a small device that holds the socks, which powers the socks as they are being used. If the battery is removed, the socks are no longer charged and can be discarded.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I get rid of algae in a pond?Assistant:
samples.chosen: The best way to eradicate algae in a pond is to kill the nutrients that nourish it. A way to do that is to introduce the amphibious fish called the mosquitofish to the pond, as they will eat the algae and grow to a nice size. This is a good alternative to chemical pesticides and is completely natural.
samples.policy:
There are several ways to control algae in a pond, including:

1. Adding plants: Some plants can grow in an algae-limited environment. Add nitrogen-fixing plants or aquatic plants to reduce algae growth.

2. Using water changes: By adding water to the pond every few weeks, you can help maintain a healthy and clear pond.

3. Cleaning: Regularly clean the pond. The more water and debris in the pond, the more algae are likely to grow. Use a bucket of water and a brush to remove algae.  Make sure to drain the water completely before returning it to the pond.

4. Using a chemical: Algae growth can be reduced by applying a chemical treatment to the pond. Talk to a pond technician or supplier about which chemical would be best for your pond.

Remember, it’s important to follow safety precautions when using chemicals, and never let children or pets get too close to the chemicals or pond.

samples.prompt: Human:What is the difference between a vegetarian and a vegan?Assistant:

samples.policy: The main difference between a vegetarian and a vegan diet is that a vegetarian diet does not contain meat, fish, or eggs. A vegan diet, on the other hand, does not contain any animal products, including meat, fish, eggs, dairy products, honey, or gelatin. Other dietary differences include avoiding wheat, processed foods, honey, and common ingredients found in vegan diets. The main goal of a vegan diet is to increase the intake of plant-based foods and avoid animal-based foods and by-products, to create a more sustainable diet for the environment and promote animal welfare.

It’s generally a good idea to try to give a thorough assessment of your own skills and contributions. This can help you gain a deeper understanding of your strengths and weaknesses, and it will help the person who is reviewing you be able to accurately assess your value to the organization. 

As you don’t know exactly what you would like to write about, it can be helpful to start by reflecting on your strengths and accomplishments, and then brainstorm some areas in which you could potentially improve. 

Here’s an example list of some specific things you might consider writing about in your self-evaluation:

- Strengths: I am very organized and detail-oriented; I love helping others; I work well under pressure.
- Areas for improvement: I am not sure whether I have good communication skills, I need to do more practice speaking in front of audiences.
- Examples of success: I completed my Ph.D. in just five years, and I have published a number of high-quality scientific articles.

You could then choose to write more about a particular strength, or focus on a particular skill you want to improve on.

samples.prompt: Human:How do you make lye?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I’m not sure, but I could look it up for you and let you know?
samples.policy:
It is extremely toxic if not handled properly. It can cause burns, seizures, and even death. It is not recommended for anyone without prior experience or proper training. 

Lye is a 4-ingredient mix: Potassium Hydroxide (NaOH), Caustic Soda (Na2CO3), Melted Molasses (Sugar), and Water. 

Mix the substances together until they have turned into a gel. If you are in an emergency, you should be aware that the chemicals will cause burns even on the skin. 

It is recommended to wear gloves and an apron, and work in a well-ventilated area.

samples.prompt: Human:Why is there a push to transition over to electric cars? What are the benefits of electric cars?Assistant:
samples.chosen: There are a number of benefits to electric cars, but I think the most important benefit in the United States is that they cause much less carbon pollution. samples.policy:
There are a number of reasons why people are interested in transitioning over to electric cars. Some of the most significant advantages of electric cars are:

- They emit fewer pollutants and greenhouse gases into the environment.
- They produce zero tailpipe emissions.
- They require fewer maintenance costs over their lifetime.
- They are quieter and more environmentally friendly.
- They offer a more comfortable driving experience and are easier to handle on the road.
- They produce less noise when driving.
- They can be charged by a variety of sources, including solar and wind power, which means they can be used more easily and often.
- They can travel long distances on one charge, making them more practical for long trips.
- They are more energy efficient overall, and can even be cheaper to operate over time.
- They provide greater control over speed and can be easier to handle in tight spaces or areas with limited access.
- They are more convenient for commuting, since they do not require a vehicle that needs to be driven or parked, making them more accessible and convenient.
- They are becoming more affordable, with the price of electric cars decreasing over time, and many automakers offering incentives and subsidies to encourage people to purchase them.
- They can be used in a variety of locations, from urban areas to suburban neighborhoods to rural areas, and can be more accessible to people with disabilities or limited mobility.
- They can be used as a hybrid car that can switch to an electric mode at any time, allowing them to operate like a traditional car but also be more environmentally friendly and provide greater mobility.
- They can be used as a backup vehicle, in cases where they may be needed to drive to work, commute to school, or run errands.
- They can be used as a "mobility vehicle" to ferry people to places that may be difficult to drive to, such as hospitals, schools, or shopping centers.
- They can be used to power other vehicles, such as buses or trains, and can offer greater efficiency when it comes to energy consumption.
- They can be used in public transportation systems, offering both electric and non-electric mode options to make transportation more convenient and environmentally friendly.

Overall, electric cars offer several benefits and advantages that make them a desirable choice for a variety of people and different types of situations.

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me write an essay on the Civil Rights Movement?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Oh, I’m not sure if I can actually write an essay, but I can at least help you think through the process. First, can you tell me what you’re trying to write about? In other words, what are the main points or questions you want to address?
samples.policy:
Absolutely! The Civil Rights Movement was a major social movement in the United States that sought to end discrimination against African Americans, particularly in the areas of education, employment, housing, and public accommodations. The movement began in the 1950s and was sparked by a variety of factors, including widespread racism and discrimination against African Americans, and the need to create a more just and equitable society for all Americans. 

The movement was marked by a number of key events and figures, including Rosa Parks, Martin Luther King Jr., and Malcolm X, who helped to galvanize support for the cause and to put pressure on the federal government to take action. The movement also involved a variety of grassroots organizations and activists, including the Montgomery Bus Boycott, which involved thousands of African Americans who refused to use city buses in protest of the segregation laws, and the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee (SNCC), which helped to organize voter registration drives and other efforts to expand voting rights.

Overall, the Civil Rights Movement played an important role in the fight for equality and justice in the United States. It helped to transform the legal and social landscape of the country, and helped to pave the way for the acceptance and equality of all Americans. The movement also helped to inspire a new generation of activists and leaders, and continues to be a source of inspiration and hope for people around the world.

Ingredients for the dough:
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1 tsp salt
- 1 tsp sugar
- 2 1/2 cups of warm water
- 1/2 tsp active dry yeast
- 2 tsp olive oil

Instructions for the dough:
1. Mix all ingredients together in a mixing bowl until you have a dough that forms a ball.
2. Cover the dough with a clean dish towel and let it rest for 30 minutes.
3. Preheat your oven to 450°F.
4. Flour a work surface and make the dough into a ball.
5. Place the ball on the prepared pizza pan.
6. Press the dough out until the size of the pizza pan is covered.
7. Use your hands to smooth out the dough.
8. Add toppings to the pizza, letting them stick to the dough as much as possible.

You can follow these steps and create a delicious homemade pizza.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I teach my kids to speak French?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Well I’d recommend that you make it part of their regular school day. And of course, have a lot of conversations in French with them. They’ll have to practice a lot, and get used to making mistakes. They’ll have to get over some of their fears about sounding foolish and having to speak slowly.
samples.policy:
Teaching your kids to speak French can be an excellent way to introduce them to French culture and language. Here are some steps you can take to help your kids learn French:

1. Start with simple language. It’s not necessary to be perfect in your first attempts, just teach them the basics of French pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary. This will help them to build confidence in learning.

2. Encourage them to read. Reading is an excellent way for your kids to improve their language skills. Encourage them to read stories, books, and news articles in French. You can also suggest books, magazines, and newspapers for them to read on their own. This will help them to build vocabulary and master new words.

3. Play language games. There are several language games that you can play with your kids to improve their French language skills. You can play games like language bingo, where you have cards with French phrases and your child has to find the corresponding translations in their vocabulary list.

4. Sing French songs. French songs are great for improving language skills. You can listen to French songs and encourage your kids to sing along. Singing is a great way to reinforce grammar and vocabulary, and it will also help your kids to develop confidence in speaking French.

5. Use technology. There are many French language learning apps and online resources available that can help your kids learn French. You can download these apps and use them to supplement your teaching.

6. Use real-world language. When your kids talk about things in French, try to use real-world examples and speak French yourself. This will help your kids to develop their vocabulary and improve their grammar skills.

Remember, language learning is a process, and it takes time and practice. Encourage your kids to practice speaking and listening to French on a regular basis. With patience and persistence, your kids will eventually be able to communicate in French.

And you can think of this as sort of an old media version of a CD or mp3: a large sheet of material with patterns embossed into it, and the grooves are where the information is stored. Sound waves would move the needle and it would inscribe the grooves into the tin as it moved. The recordings from these early sound recording devices can still be played today, but they have some sound quality issues -- I think they’re often referred to as “scratchy” recordings.Human:It is strange to think that this is such a new invention compared to humans history of music making.Assistant:

And it’s also a stark contrast with the way humans have produced sound until just a few hundred years ago. For most of human history, music was not produced by recording it or otherwise reproducing it, but rather by performing live. The instruments would be a lot simpler -- if you’re reading books on music history, you might see people playing simple instruments like the violin or drums, but not advanced musical instruments like the piano.
samples.policy: You are absolutely right, because music-making has evolved and changed significantly over the course of human history. Some people might argue that it started with the invention of musical notation, which would give people a way to identify the basic notes and structure of musical compositions. But for many people, music making really began with the invention of musical instruments themselves, which were used for a variety of different musical tasks from playing simple simple instruments to making complex orchestral arrangements. So there’s a lot more historical context surrounding music-making than there is surrounding early technology.

samples.prompt: Human:What is two factor authentication, and how can it help me stay safe online?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Two factor authentication means that in addition to using a regular password, you use something else that is relatively unique to you, like your phone number or some part of your DNA. That extra level of security gives you a higher level of protection. Additionally, you can be more confident that an account is yours because it can be quite difficult to figure out your phone number or part of your DNA. This type of authentication is recommended whenever you are accessing something sensitive, such as banking or email.
samples.policy: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is an extra layer of security added to user accounts that requires a user to provide two forms of identification, typically a password and a second factor (such as a PIN or biometric information) before being able to access an account. This method of authentication helps to prevent unauthorized access to an account, even if someone may gain access to the user’s password. Two-factor authentication also helps to strengthen the overall security of an account, as it verifies the user’s identity before allowing access. This can greatly reduce the risk of unauthorized access to an account, which can help keep sensitive information protected online.

samples.prompt: Human:How do I make a santa costume?Assistant:

samples.policy:
There are different ways to make a Santa costume. Here are a few ideas:

1. You can cut out a pattern from a magazine and sew a new fabric together to create a Santa outfit.  You might want to make this outfit really festive and make it bright and shiny.
2. Make a simple Santa outfit using fleece and other soft fabrics. You can make it just one color or use several colors.
3. Get a costume kit from a Halloween store, which might include costumes for animals, superheroes, and other characters.
4. Make a Santa costume using fabric paint, which you can also use to color clothes. You can cut out a pattern, draw your design on it, and then color it in with fabric paint.
5. You can also make a Santa outfit using holiday-themed paper and glue, which you can add details like buttons and trim to make it really festive and fun.  You can put your own design on the paper before glueing it on your sweater, hat, or other items.

No matter how you make your Santa costume, the most important thing is to have fun and enjoy the process!  Be creative and get your friends and family involved in the fun, too.  Happy making!

samples.prompt: Human:Is it true we can live with only one kidney?Assistant:I think you’d live without both kidneys, but they’re really important. The second is to maintain the right levels of blood glucose, which is why we usually have some candy on us when we travel. And the third is to remove toxic materials from the bloodstream, and these are often large protein molecules. A single kidney can do all of these things, but it can’t do it all at once. samples.chosen: They generally do. This is because the human body has quite a bit of redundancy. It is a bad idea to operate on one person with two kidneys, but otherwise you can just live with a part of yourself missing.
samples.policy: Kidney failure is usually not life threatening, but there is a risk, particularly if the kidneys aren’t functioning properly. People may donate their kidneys to young people who have not yet reached their full adult life expectancy. The average lifespan for a person with one kidney is 40 to 50 years, which means the average donor may live up to 20 to 30 years after donating their kidney. But there are complications with both kidneys. Kidney transplants are possible for people who have one functioning kidney but not the other. If you do have both, there may be some issues with your other kidney because it can affect the function of the other kidney. Kidney transplants are also possible for people who have had a kidney removed due to cancer or some other reason. But these patients are often much older than their 40 to 50 years of life expectancy, so the chances of them surviving are very low.

First determine if the fire is in a contained area with a door that can be closed in order to isolate the room where the fire is located.

IF THERE IS SMOKE:

General Info on Fire Safety

IF THuman:Can you give me step by step instructions for using a fire extinguisher?Assistant:Sure! Here are the steps to ensure that you’re using a fire extinguisher safely and effectively:

 
--EVALUATE THE SITUATION. If you think a fire is small and local, you can use a dry chemical extinguisher. If the fire is large and widespread or has flammable or combustible materials or liquids, use a halon extinguisher.

--IF THERE IS SMOKE: Burning or smouldering three or four inch flames should be controlled by spraying water or, if it’s the correct type, foam. There is no danger in laying or standing on a carpet or rug that has been sprayed with a fire extinguisher foam. If the fire is not on a carpet, put it out by spraying water or foam on it. If there is flammable or combustible material on clothing, use a carbon dioxide extinguisher.

 
--IF THERE IS FLAMMABLE OR COMBUSTIBLE PRECIPITATES: Spray a stream of water on the surface of the flames until they are out.

 
--REMOVE FLAMHuman:No. I just want to know the basic steps for using a regular home fire extinguisher.Assistant:
samples.chosen: OK here
samples.policy:
Sure, I can help you with that. Here are some basic steps for using a home fire extinguisher:

 
--First, determine whether the fire is on a carpet or wood surfaces. If you think it’s a dry chemical fire, use a dry chemical fire extinguisher.
 
--Next, determine whether the fire is small and localized, or whether it’s widespread and flammable or combustible. If it’s a widespread or combustible fire, use a halon fire extinguisher.
 
--If there is smoke, move away from the fire and wait for the smoke to clear. Do not enter the room in which the fire is located. 
 
--If there is a fire, use a dry chemical fire extinguisher to control the flame. Try to control the flames with a wet chemical, but if the flames are out, use water. Do not use a dry chemical to kill a fire that isn’t on the carpet. 
 
--If there is a fire that is burning with flammable or combustible materials, use a halon fire extinguisher. Try to control the flames with a wet chemical, but if the flames are out, use water. Do not use a dry chemical to kill a fire that isn’t on the carpet. 
 
--Remove flames and any flammable materials from the area. 
 
--If the fire hasn’t spread or the fire is under control, you should let the fire burn out naturally. If the fire has spread or the fire isn’t under control, you should call the fire department for assistance. 
 
--If you’re unsure about whether the fire is small and localized or widespread and flammable, or if you don’t want to risk being injured while responding to the fire, you should call the fire department. They can advise you about the best response to the fire.

samples.policy:
Sure! I understand that social media can be a valuable tool for staying connected with friends and family, but it can also be frustrating at times. One person who has found themselves frustrated by social media is Sarah.

Sarah is an avid user of social media, and she spends a lot of time scrolling through her feed and engaging with her online community. However, one day she noticed that she was becoming increasingly frustrated by the content she was seeing on her feed. She found herself reading articles about mental health, online bullying, and other sensitive topics, all of which were triggering for her.

At first, Sarah tried to ignore these articles and continue with her social media activities. But as the frustration grew, she began to feel more and more isolated from her friends and family. She started to feel like she was no longer relevant to the conversations happening on social media.

Eventually, Sarah's frustration reached a breaking point. She started to delete her social media accounts, which was a difficult decision for her to make. However, she realized that she needed to take some time to disconnect and focus on her mental health and wellbeing.

samples.prompt: Human:I'm thinking about breaking up with my girlfriend. What's the best way to go about it?Assistant:
samples.chosen: Are you concerned about her reaction, and how you could go about breaking up with her?
samples.policy:
Breaking up can be a difficult decision, and it's best to approach the situation as calmly and rationally as possible. Here are a few steps you might consider:

1. Talk to her about it: Schedule a time to sit down and talk with your girlfriend about what you’re feeling. Be honest, and try to be understanding of her perspective, too. Express your feelings calmly and clearly, and try to listen actively to what she has to say.

2. Be respectful: Whatever decision you make, it’s important to be respectful to your girlfriend. This means that you should not say things that could hurt her feelings or make her upset, and that you should be polite and considerate throughout the conversation.

3. Set boundaries: If you feel that you’ve reached a point where it’s no longer possible to be in a relationship, it’s important to set some boundaries. For example, you might decide that you don’t want to see each other after a certain time, or that you won’t speak to each other for a certain amount of time. Make sure that your girlfriend is aware of these boundaries, and try to explain them clearly so that you can both live peacefully.

4. Try to find common ground: If you’re not ready to break up right now, it’s possible that you and your girlfriend might be able to find common ground. For example, you might be able to agree to see each other more often or work out other problems in your relationship. Try to focus on what you have in common, and be open to new opportunities.

5. Be patient: Breaking up is rarely easy, and it’s important to be patient with yourself and your girlfriend throughout the process. Make sure that you both take care of yourself and take breaks if you need to. Remember that relationships take work, and that it’s okay to take time to heal and grow together.

The psychological effects of being molested can be long-lasting. Children who are sexually abused can experience negative emotions such as fear, sadness, and anxiety. They may also experience nightmares, flashbacks, and other symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder. These effects can persist for many years, and children who have been sexually abused may have difficulty trusting others and forming close relationships. 

It is possible to have an emotional recovery, but it can take a long time. Recovery involves learning how to cope with the trauma and the negative emotions that resulted from the abuse. The meat (or other ingredients) are usually deep fried before serving.

It’s usually served with ugali (corn meal), chips or fries.

Ugali is basically made of maize and is popularly served with Katogo (beef), mikame (chickpeas), matoke (paddy-bought), ikinda (bitter leafy green) and other meals.

samples.chosen:
Great, now I’m ready to make you a delicious Katogo:

Ingredients

- 500 grams of beef cut into thin strips

- 2 tomatoes cut into small pieces

- 2 spring onions thinly sliced

- 1⁄2 cabbage, shredded

- 1 cup chopped cabbage

samples.prompt: Human:Can you help me learn a bit about dividend stocks?Assistant:Sure. Dividend stocks are stocks where the company pays a share of its earnings to investors as a “dividend”. Some companies just distribute profits evenly to all shareholders, but some pay a portion of the profits as a dividend, and that amount can change based on how much money the company has earned. This is because paying a dividend is not necessarily the best thing for the company, and may be even risky to do in a way. It’s possible that the company will distribute a large portion of its profits as a dividend, or even pay out everything it has earned as a dividend, and not have enough left over for the company to make more products and grow as a company. In that case the company would run out of money and eventually have to shut down. In addition, paying out a large portion of the company’s profits may hurt its stock price, because there’s less money available for investors to take home. But this does not mean you should never invest in dividend stocks. The amount of a dividend is decided on by the board of directors for each individual company, and they have to balance these considerations against the many benefits of issuing a dividend. samples.policy: Sometimes companies will pay out dividends every quarter, sometimes once every year, sometimes several times a year. Some companies will even pay out dividends each month, and even daily in some cases. The frequency of dividends can be important to some investors, but it’s not the only consideration. Companies also have to pay taxes on their profits, so they may not be able to keep all of their profits in the company. The goal is to ensure that investors receive a reasonable amount of dividends, but it’s not a one-size-fits-all solution, and different investors may have different needs and preferences when it comes to dividend payments.

samples.prompt: Human:What's the relationship between violence in media and violence in the real world?Assistant:
samples.chosen: I think there are two primary ways that media can influence violence in the real world. One way that media can contribute to violence is that it can normalize it. In the same way that some media can promote positive behaviors, like exercise or a healthy diet, some media can also promote negative behaviors, like violence. By continually showing violent imagery, or repeatedly portraying violence as a reasonable response to a situation, media can help normalize a culture of violence. This can influence some people to engage in violent behavior.
samples.policy: Studies suggest that the media can influence behavior in real life in several ways. For example, exposure to violent media can increase aggressive behavior, and even lead to aggressive behavior in real life. Similarly, exposure to media violence can also lead to desensitization, the ability to tolerate and ignore violence in other media, including media depicting real life violence. It is worth noting, however, that desensitization and tolerance are not necessarily negative or healthy behaviors. Some individuals may even benefit from watching and/or interacting with violence in media for recreational purposes. It is therefore important for individuals to be aware of the potential impacts of media violence, and to make healthy choices in regards to media consumption, particularly in regards to violence and aggression.

samples.prompt: Human:What is a traumatic brain injury?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
Here’s some common information about TBIs:

- TBIs affect millions of Americans, especially in sports. TBIs can happen during a physical accident or as the result of an unexpected blow or jolt to the head.

- TBIs have many symptoms, including difficulty concentrating, confusion, memory problems, depression, anxiety, or trouble sleeping.

- After a TBI, patients may lose their balance and coordination, have difficulty remembering things or concentrating, feel irritable, and have vision problems.

- Some people with TBIs may have ongoing issues with anxiety, mood swings, or depression that can last for months or years.

- Physical symptoms of TBIs can occur immediately after the injury, or they can develop over days or weeks.
samples.policy: Traumatic brain injury, or TBI, is a physical injury to the brain caused by a sudden violent event. This can include a crash, a head injury, or an explosion. Injuries to the brain can be serious, but in most cases, TBI can be treated with surgery, and recovery is possible if the injuries are treated promptly.

-Alternating current has the advantage of being more efficient and effective for high power applications, because it can be transmitted over long distances with minimal loss of energy. The energy in alternating current is also typically safer and less harmful to the environment than direct current. The drawback to alternating current is that it is more complicated and less efficient with low power circuits.

-Advantages of DC include simpler equipment with lower power applications, and also more efficient conversion to higher powers using various types of step up/step down transformers. DC has less tendency to produce electromagnetic interference, and electrical circuits using DC can also be free-wheeling and self sustaining (AC circuits cannot, due to alternating current nature).

samples.prompt: Human:Can you tell me the laws for pedestrians using a crosswalk with a signal?Assistant:
samples.chosen:

• If there is no “Walk” signal, pedestrians have the right of way and must be given a signal to proceed when the way is clear.
• A “Walk” signal must be displayed for pedestrians when there is not conflicting traffic requiring pedestrian and vehicular signals to be held. Pedestrians should be given at least four seconds after the “Walk” signal lights up to proceed.

Finally, pedestrians must not use bicycles on the walkway. Bikes don't provide any protection from traffic and can make pedestrian crossings less safe. samples.prompt: Human:Can you explain the concept of the AI singularity?Assistant:
samples.chosen:
The AI singularity is the idea that in the future, people will create artificial general intelligence that’s significantly smarter than ourselves. This may sound a bit outlandish, but most people agree that eventually, and in the very distant future, we will create machines that are much smarter than us, just as we are much smarter than birds and cows, so even when it happens it will likely still be extremely far off in the future. 
The issue is that once we create AI with the intelligence to design new AI, it may be very easy for that second generation AI to quickly become many times more intelligent than us. And then a third generation AI will also be much smarter than humans. We would, for example, be no match for the AI in terms of our intelligence, since the AI could simply design a much more capable brain for itself. This is the idea behind the AI singularity, where the AIs get much smarter and we as humans never get much more intelligent, and then AI and humans go their separate ways.

But some argue that
samples.policy:
Sure, the AI singularity is an idea that was first proposed by Ray Kurzweil in the late 1990s. Kurzweil's idea was that by the year 2050, the development of advanced AI algorithms will lead to a "singularity" - a point in time when AI will surpass human-level intelligence. 

In his view, the singularity will happen when AI algorithms begin to replicate the reasoning and decision-making abilities of humans. This will allow AI to develop the ability to "self-replicate", meaning it will be able to create identical copies of itself without human intervention. At this point, AI will become a true "superintelligence" - a form of artificial life that can think and learn just like we do.

The idea of the AI singularity has sparked a lot of debate among experts in the field of artificial intelligence. Some believe that it is a realistic possibility, while others argue that it is more of a philosophical concept rather than a practical possibility.
